tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_publications (
    publication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    authors VARCHAR(255)[] ,
    publication_date DATE,
    citation_count INT,
    topic VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE research_publications (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  authors TEXT,
  publication_date DATE,
  citation_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE research_publications (
    publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    authors VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    citation_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE research_citations (
    citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_id INT,
    citing_publication_id INT,
    citation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES research_publications(publication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchPublications (
    publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_title VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    author_name VARCHAR(100),
    publication_abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Citations (
    citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_id INT,
    cited_publication_id INT,
    citation_date DATE,
    citation_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES ResearchPublications(publication_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cited_publication_id) REFERENCES ResearchPublications(publication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_id INT,
    author_id INT,
    collaboration_date DATE,
    published BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES ResearchPublications(publication_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES Authors(author_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Research_Papers (
  paper_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  authors TEXT,
  publication_year INT,
  keywords TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Citations (
  citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  paper_id INT,
  cited_paper_id INT,
  citation_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (paper_id) REFERENCES Research_Papers(paper_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (cited_paper_id) REFERENCES Research_Papers(paper_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Publications (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  year INT,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  researcher_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Collaboration (
  collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES Publications(publication_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);
